values: 形；形状；外形；样子；方式；形式；模糊的人；模糊的物；朦胧的形状；<非正式>情况；状态；身体状况；健壮；成型；成形；定型；模子；（Shape）沙佩（人名）
成形；成型；形成；使…成形；塑造；决定；影响；使适合；使符合；发展；进展；计划；思考出；表现良好；健身；摆姿势；做动作
（SHAPE）（北大西洋公约组织）欧洲盟军最高司令部（Supreme Headquarters Allied Powers（in）Europe的缩写）

synonym.mean: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 外形, 形状, 形态, 塑造

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 合适的；成某种形状的；有计划的
发展；成形（shape的过去分词和过去式）
定形的；形状美观的；样子好的；有条理的
不成形的；不定形的；不象样的
[电子] 整形器，脉冲整形器；[机] 牛头刨床；造型者；塑造者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指把有延展性的材料浇铸或塑成所需形状的物品。
比mould使用广泛，指用许多不同的方法制成不同形状的制品。
通常指对尚未成形的物品作进一步加工，使成为成品。
意义较窄，指用锤子和砧对金属材料进行加工或锻造。
指轮廓、外形，尤指体态，相貌或身体。
最普通用词，含义广，既可指客观物体的外形，又可用于抽象概念的“形”。
通常指由线和面所围成的外观上的形，侧重立体形状。

word_group.brief_definition: 以…形式表现；通过…形式；具有…性质
保持体型；保持身材；保持健康
变形, 变样；身体不好, 不舒服

word_group.phrase: the shape of things to come

word_group.brief_definition: 不好好干就卷铺盖走人
以任何形式；在各种情况之下
把…训练好；把…整顿好；使像样
以任何形式；在各种情况之下
word_group.phrase: in any way, shape or form

bilingual.source: Find a place to make your shape.
bilingual.target: 找一个地方制作你的形状。

bilingual.source: Keep going until you have finished the shape.
bilingual.target: 继续进行直到你完成形状。

bilingual.source: Its round shape stands for family reunions.
bilingual.target: 它圆圆的形状象征着家庭团圆。

bilingual.source: You can group them by colour, size or shape.
bilingual.target: 你可以按颜色、大小或形状分组。

bilingual.source: Mooncakes are in the shape of a full moon on the Mid-Autumn night.
bilingual.target: 月饼在中秋夜的形状像满月。

bilingual.source: I'd like to squeeze this round world into a new shape.
bilingual.target: 我想把这个圆圆的世界挤压成一个新形状。

bilingual.source: One winter day, the old couple began to shape snow into the form of a girl.
bilingual.target: 一个冬日，老夫妇开始把雪塑造成一个女孩的形状。

bilingual.source: When matter breaks down, it goes through a change in size, shape, and color.
bilingual.target: 当物质分解时，它的大小、形状和颜色会发生变化。
这个碗有一个凹的形状。

bilingual.source: I like the shape of this dress.
bilingual.target: 我喜欢这件衣服的形状。

list.abstract: shape（英[ʃeɪp]，美[ʃeɪp]），英语单词，作名词用，为形状；外观；外形。作动词用，为使成形；塑造；形成。短语搭配有body shape（身体形态；体型），例句为“I need to get in shape.（我需要保持体形。）” shape名词类近义词有matrix、form、model，及物动词类近义词有mold、make、model，不及物动词类近义词有to come into being、to form，复数形式为shapes。

yingyinNormal.en: And that shape determines how the universe will live and die.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样不同的形状决定着宇宙将会怎样存在和灭亡。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you know that the iconic Valentine's heart shape is not actually based on the shape of a human heart, but rather on the shape of the buttocks of a female bending over?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们知道人们情人节送的这种心形符号其实它的原型并不是人的心脏，而是女性弯腰时显露的臀部形状吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I could tell from the shape of the leaves and the texture of the trunk. It was a sycamore tree.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从叶子的形状和枝干的纹路来看，是一棵梧桐树。

yingyinNormal.en: And for application, I just make kind of a three shape on my cheeks and I guess that's it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了效果，我在我的脸颊上按照3的形状涂抹，就是这样啦。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I'm not. French fries have three variables, crispiness, saltiness and shape. Which is why a curly fry only gets a two.
yingyinNormal.zh: 才不是呢，炸薯条有三个变量，松脆度，含盐量，形状，所以卷卷薯条只能得2分。

yingyinNormal.en: First, you paint a big circle. No, George, that's the wrong color. Now you paint the flower's petals. George! That's the wrong shape!
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先画一个大大的圆圈。乔治，不对，颜色不对。接着呢，我们来画花瓣。乔治，形状不对。

yingyinNormal.en: George has found the second clue. Sticks in the shape of an arrow. Look. They point this way. Peppa and George are following the arrows.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治找到了第二个线索，摆成箭头形状的木棍。看，指着这个方向。佩琪和乔治跟着箭头走。

yingyinNormal.en: What's that? Clay. All pottery starts off like that. That is soft, like play-clay. We need it to be soft, so we can shape it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么东西啊。黏土。所有的陶器都是用这个做的。可是这个也是软的，就像彩泥一样。我们要用这个软软的黏土捏出形状。

yingyinNormal.en: Over 100 years ago, Einstein developed the Theory of General Relativity, formed of equations that help us understand the relationship between what a universe is made of and its shape.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一百多年前，爱因斯坦提出了广义相对论，帮助我们以方程的形式来理解宇宙的组成和其形状之间的关系。

yingyinNormal.en: I like to stay in shape.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想要保持状态。

yingyinNormal.en: The president's in very bad shape. Sir...
yingyinNormal.zh: 总统情况很糟。先生……

yingyinNormal.en: But once I get her fixed up, she's gonna be in good shape.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是把她修好后，又是条好船。

yingyinNormal.en: They are quite meaty so they are gonna hold their shape quite well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肉质肥厚，所以下锅后形不会散。

yingyinNormal.en: So, Coach, how's the team looking? Troy got them whipped into shape?
yingyinNormal.zh: 教练，校队状况如何？特洛伊的状况十分良好把？

yingyinNormal.en: China's vast and varied land has helped shape a nation and its people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 中国得广袤土地囊括万象，孕育了这个国家，养育了它的人民。

yingyinNormal.en: We train in hand-to-hand combat. It keeps us in shape. And aggressive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们还接受真刀真枪的搏斗训练，这使得我们保持强健，也更好斗。

yingyinNormal.en: I think the trick is just to keep their shape when you're handling them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 难就难在翻面的时候要注意不能把豆腐弄散。

yingyinNormal.en: Recut into a heartlike shape that became known as the Heart of the Ocean.
yingyinNormal.zh: 重新切割成心形，叫"海洋之心"。

yingyinNormal.en: We push the boundaries of robotics here. My students go on to shape the future.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这里，我们不断地探索机器人的极限，我的学生们会创造未来。

yingyinNormal.en: Bit of flour on the bench. Get your dough out, shape it into a rough rectangle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在面板上撒一些面粉，取出面团，做成长方形。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使成形; 塑造; 影响
框架; 结构; 特点; 形式

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 形状；外观；外形；特定的条件；伪装；特色

sense_info_list.zh: 使成形; 塑造; 影响

examination_example.sentence: We need progressive policies that <highlight>shape</highlight> collective action, alongside engaged citizens pushing for change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要形成集体行动的进步政策，以及积极参与推动变革的公民。

examination_example.sentence: It's not hard to imagine that local culture and sentiment would help <highlight>shape</highlight> how executives think about the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不难想象，当地的文化和情感将有助于影响高管们对未来的看法。

examination_example.sentence: This movement, driven by powerful and diverse motivations, <highlight>shaped</highlight> the character and destiny of an uncharted continent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这场运动由强大而多样的动机驱动，塑造了一个未知大陆的特征和命运。

examination_example.sentence: Some people with a high BMI are in fact extremely fit, while others with a low BMI may be in poor <highlight>shape</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些身体质量指数高的人实际上非常健康，而另一些身体质量指数低的人却可能身体状况不佳。

sense_info_list.zh: 框架; 结构; 特点; 形式

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 外形, 形状, 形态, 塑造

word_usage.usage:
表示“形状；外形”
shape指物体的外形，侧重于外观上的几何形状，也可指人或物模糊而蒙眬的影子。
figure指人体外部线条构成的轮廓，尤指女性的柔美身段。
form可特指某事物的具体组成结构、形式、体制。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意思是“外形”，指线、面所构成的外表形状。
指“形状”，意思较为广泛，不仅指物体的形状，而且指诗文的格式。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 塑造成形; 形状; 结构

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: give a particular shape or form to
sense_info_list.zh: 塑造成形; 形状; 结构

examination_example.sentence: As technology progresses, we all have a duty to make sure that we <highlight>shape</highlight> a future that we would want to find ourselves in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着技术的进步，我们都有责任确保我们塑造一个我们想要的未来。

examination_example.sentence: Framestore used body doubles with resemblance to Hepburn's facial structure and body <highlight>shape</highlight> as a framework for manual animation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Framestore使用与Hepburn面部结构和体型相似的身体替身作为手绘动画的框架。

examination_example.sentence: These beams formed the cross-<highlight>shaped</highlight> roof that ran the length of the central part of the cathedral.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些横梁构成了横跨大教堂中心部分的十字形屋顶。

examination_example.sentence: The closer you are to someone, the more likely it becomes that the beliefs you don't share will <highlight>shape</highlight> your thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你和某人越亲近，你不认同的信念就越有可能影响你的思维。

sense_info_list.en: make something fit the form of something else

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 外形, 形状, 形态, 塑造

word_usage.usage:
shape表示“人或事物的情况、状况、状态”，用作不可数名词。
in shape = healthy 健康
out of shape = unhealthy 不健康
in poor shape 状况不好

exam_freq_info.chinese: 塑造成形; 形状; 结构

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: give a particular shape or form to
sense_info_list.zh: 塑造成形; 形状; 结构

examination_example.sentence: That's an opportunity to <highlight>shape</highlight> that system differently, and if we can, it will have tremendous significance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个以不同方式塑造这个系统的机会，如果我们能做到，它将具有巨大的意义。

examination_example.sentence: My identity had been <highlight>shaped</highlight> by years of never reading, seeing, hearing, or learning about people who had a similar background as me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多年来，我从未阅读、看到、听到或了解过与我背景相似的人，这形成了我的身份。

examination_example.sentence: The concept has multiple forms, and scholars and policymakers argue about the <highlight>shape</highlight>, scope and cost of the ideal program.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一概念有多种形式，学者和决策者对理想计划的形式、范围和成本存在争议。

examination_example.sentence: Excluding body <highlight>shape</highlight> as a category in the labor contract.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 劳动合同中不包括体型。

examination_example.sentence: The study answered this question by tracking a sample of Americans over a period when bodies change from teenage <highlight>shape</highlight> into adult form.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究通过跟踪一组美国人样本的身体从青少年时期到成年时期的变化来回答这个问题。

examination_example.sentence: They have to do with people's body weight and <highlight>shape</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们与人的体重和体型有关。

examination_example.sentence: Genes and the environment interact in many complex ways to <highlight>shape</highlight> individuals and guide their behavior, including their curiosity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基因和环境以许多复杂的方式相互作用，塑造个体，引导他们的行为，包括他们的好奇心。

examination_example.sentence: What do we learn about how genes <highlight>shape</highlight> people's behavior?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于基因如何塑造人的行为，我们了解了什么?

sense_info_list.en: make something fit the form of something else

word_usage.usage:
shape表示“人或事物的情况、状况、状态”，用作不可数名词。
in shape = healthy 健康
out of shape = unhealthy 不健康
in poor shape 状况不好

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 以…形式表现；通过…形式；具有…性质

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 形状；外观；外形；特定的条件；伪装；特色

examination_example.sentence: The quality of grassland will be tracked by monitoring the <highlight>shape</highlight>, color and texture (质地) of grass.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将通过监测草的形状、颜色和质地来跟踪草地的质量。

examination_example.sentence: I need to get in <highlight>shape</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我需要保持体形。

examination_example.sentence: Modern technology may help to <highlight>shape</highlight> the rivers' temporal frame.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现代技术可能有助于塑造河流的时间框架。

examination_example.sentence: How education <highlight>shaped</highlight> his life?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教育如何塑造了他的人生？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 以…形式表现；通过…形式；具有…性质
保持体型；保持身材；保持健康

sense_info_list.en: give a particular shape or form to
sense_info_list.zh: 塑造成形; 形状; 结构

examination_example.sentence: This island is almost <highlight>shaped</highlight> like a circle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个岛几乎是圆形的。

examination_example.sentence: What you learn at school plays a very important part in <highlight>shaping</highlight> your behaviour in society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你在学校学到的东西在塑造你的社会行为方面起着非常重要的作用。

examination_example.sentence: Flowers of all colors and <highlight>shapes</highlight> can be seen everywhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 各种颜色和形状的花随处可见。

examination_example.sentence: How Habits <highlight>Shape</highlight> People's Life？
examination_example.sentence_trans: 习惯是如何塑造人的？

examination_example.sentence: These companies are <highlight>shaping</highlight> the world with highly developed technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些公司正在用高度发达的技术塑造世界。

examination_example.sentence: For his eleventh birthday, Lin was given a gift that would <highlight>shape</highlight> his life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在林11岁生日的时候，他收到了一份能决定他一生的礼物。

examination_example.sentence: She only started running at the age of 50, as a way to keep in <highlight>shape</highlight>, but soon realized it was her passion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她50岁才开始跑步，作为保持身材的一种方式，但很快意识到这是她的激情所在。

examination_example.sentence: Keep in <highlight>shape</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保持身材。

examination_example.sentence: These children were physically in better <highlight>shape</highlight> and drank fewer sugary soft drinks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些孩子的身体状况更好，喝的含糖软饮料也更少。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 外形, 形状, 形态, 塑造

word_usage.usage:
shape表示“人或事物的情况、状况、状态”，用作不可数名词。
in shape = healthy 健康
out of shape = unhealthy 不健康
in poor shape 状况不好

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，既可指客观物体的外形，又可指抽象概念的"形"。
侧重外观上的几何形状，也可指人或物模糊而朦胧的影子。
